reporter-output.line: PR1: Login to Amazon and Clearing Cart items as a Pre-requisites
PR2: Verify Application is launched and 'Amazon Home' screen is displayed.
PR3: Open Email In Next Tab
PR4: verify Yahoo login Page Displayed
PR5: Enter Registered Email
PR6: Proceed By Entering Email
PR7: verify Yahoo Password Page Displayed
PR8: Enter Password for yahoo account.
PR9: Proceed By Entering Password
PR10: verify Yahoo Home Page Displayed
PR11: Switch to parent window and verify Amazon Home Page Displayed
PR12: Click on login Button
PR13: verify Amazon Sign In Page Displayed
PR14: Enter registered email Under Search Box
PR15: Click on continue Button
PR16: verify Amazon Sign In Page Displayed
PR17: Click on continue Button
PR18: verify Amazon Authentication Page Displayed
PR19: switch To Child Window and verify Inbox Page Displayed.
PR20: Click on email Link
PR21: verify Yahoo Mail Page Displayed
PR22: verify a new Authentication Mail received
PR23: Click On First Unread Authentication Mail
PR24: verify Yahoo Mail Page Displayed
PR25: verify Email Body is Opened
PR26: get OTP from mail
PR27: Log out from yahoo account
PR28: verify Yahoo login Page Displayed
PR29: Click on sign Out Button
PR30: verify Yahoo Home Page Displayed
PR31: Switch to parent window and verify Amazon Authentication Page Displayed
PR32: Enter OTP
PR33: click On Continue Button
PR34: verify Amazon Home Page Displayed
PR35: click On Shopping Cart Button
PR36: verify Shopping cart Pages Displayed
PR37: Clear all items from cart
1: Verify Search box displayed.
2: Enter text as 'headphone best seller' in search box.
3: Click on Search Button.
4: Verify Searched Item page displayed.
5: click On First Page If Not Displayed
6: Get List Of Best Seller Items Displayed
7: click And Open All Best Seller Items Displayed
8: verify All the Detailed Item Pages Displayed In Multiple Tabs
9: click On Add To Cart Button For Each Item
10: verify Search Page Displayed For Item
11: click On Shopping Cart Button
12: verify Shopping cart Pages Displayed
13: verify Added Items In Cart.
14: Logged out.
